amendment.description: To prohibit the use of funds for assistance to the Islamic Republic of Iran.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3727 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3727 proposed by Senator McConnell for Senator Kennedy to Amendment SA 3695. (consideration: CR S5901; text: CR S5901) To prohibit the use of funds for assistance to the Islamic Republic of Iran.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3727 proposed by Senator McConnell for Senator Kennedy to Amendment SA 3695.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3727 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
